Attacks.Name: Psywave
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is given the Confuse special condition.

Attacks.Name: Psychic
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is Pushed away from this character by S distance.

Attacks.Name: Aura Sphere
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores line of sight and does not require line of sight.

Superpowers.Name: Teleport
Superpowers.Effect: Place this character within range 3 of its current position.

Superpowers.Name: Mew's Versatility
Superpowers.Effect: Once per turn, when this character is targeted by an attack, it can change its resistant type to the type of the attacking characterâ€™s attack.

Attacks.Name: Psychic Fury
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is given the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Mew's Resilience
Superpowers.Effect: Remove all damage from this character. This superpower can be used only once per game.
